start_date.description: Enter the start date of the simulation

end_date.description: Enter the end date of the simulation

crop.description: Enter name of crop to sow :

script.text: if (today = date('[date]') then [crop] sow plants =[density], sowing_depth = [depth], cultivar = [cultivar], row_spacing = [row_spacing], skip = [skiprow], tiller_no_fertile = [ftn] endif

crop.description: Enter name of crop to harvest when ripe :

script.name: end_of_day
script.text: if [crop].StageName = 'harvest_ripe' or [crop].plant_status = 'dead' then [crop] harvest [crop] end_crop endif

script.name: end_of_day
script.text:
if (paddock_is_fallow() = 0) then outputfile do_output endif
InCropRain = InCropRain + rain
TT = TT + DeltaTT
if (day > 152) then current_season = year else current_season = year -1 endif

asw_depth.description: Depth to which ASW is calculated. (mm)

crit_fr_asw.description: Fraction of ASW below which irrigation is applied (0-1.0)

operation.action: fertiliser apply amount = 40 (kg/ha), depth = 50 (mm), type = NO3_N ()
fertiliser apply amount = 46 (kg/ha), depth = 50 (mm), type = NO3_N ()

sorghumConstants.name: standard
sorghumConstants.stage_names: sowing germination emergence end_of_juvenile floral_initiation flag_leaf flowering start_grain_fill end_grain_fill maturity harvest_ripe end_crop

leaf_app_rate1.description: Growing deg day required to develop the most leaf ligules. (deg day).

leaf_app_rate2.description: Growing deg day required to develop last leaf ligules. (deg day).

if (paddock_is_fallow() = 0) then outputfile do_output endif

TT = TT + DeltaTT
if (day > 152) then current_season = year else current_season = year -1 endif

fertiliser apply amount = 46 (kg/ha), depth = 50 (mm), type = NO3_N ()
